title: Hate no more
author: VD
content_html: Engadget still doesn’t quite grok the fullness of the mouse, but they don’t actually hate it any longer. In fact, they even went so far to describe it as “the most advanced mouse we’ve ever seen.” Despite the caveats and minor misconceptions, I’m quite pleased with the review. And the review unit is a prototype, btw, so the plastic on the production units is completely different.
content_text:
Engadget still doesn’t quite grok the fullness of the mouse, but
they don’t actually hate it
any longer.  In fact, they even went so far to describe it as “the most advanced mouse we’ve ever seen.”  Despite the caveats and minor misconceptions, I’m quite pleased with the review.  And the review unit is a prototype, btw, so the plastic on the production units is completely different.
